typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	limit: 100,
	format: 'table',
	tableName: 'MASTER_FN_POSITION_V1',
	schemaName: 'SCD',
	store: 'snowflake') ~> snowflake
snowflake sink(input(

		EFFECTIVE_DATE as string,

		DIRTY_VALUE_TOTAL_QC as string,
		DIV_COUPON_RECEIVABLES_BASE as string,
		DIV_COUPON_RECEIVABLES_LOCAL as string,

		IMPAIRMENT_PROVISION_LOCAL as string,
		IMPAIRMENT_SECURITY_BASE as string,

		LOCAL_CURRENCY_CODE as string,
		LONG_SHORT_INDICATOR as string,
		LOWEST_LEVEL_PORTFOLIO as string,

	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,

snowflake sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2
